name: Hearty Garlic Slaw
author: pho1962
summary: This is not a sweet or mayo-heavy slaw. The dressing is creamy and rich and the sunflower seeds give it a great crunchy heartiness. Men who hate veggies gobble this up!
ingredients: 1 cup sunflower seeds, or more to taste
¾ cup finely chopped broccoli florets
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mash eggs, avocado, olive oil, garlic, and lemon-pepper seasoning together in a bowl until sauce is smooth
Add cabbage and Greek yogurt to sauce and toss until evenly coated
Mix onion, sunflower seeds, and broccoli into cabbage mixture until evenly coated
Mix lemon juice, salt, and pepper into slaw
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
